Translations.Text: Ndarahiye ku Majuru afise Inyenyeri
No k’umusi w’isango bemerewe
N’uwuzoba icabona kuki boneshwa
Barahonejwe	abantu	batoteje	aba	Isilamubari	kubirindiro	vyabovyomubinogo
Bifise umuriro w’inkwi nyinshi cane
Mugihe bari bicaye ngaho
Nabo bitegereza ivyo bagirirwa abo ba Isilamu
Nabo batara bona inabi iyariyo yose kuri bo, atari ukwemera Imana yabo ariyo nyene intsinzi n’uguhayagizwa bimwe bikwiye
Ikaba ariyo nyene ubwami bw’Amajuru n’Isi, n’Imana niyo ibona ibintu vyose

Mu vy’ukuri bamwe batoteza aba Isilamu b’abagabo hamwe naba Isilamu kazi, hanyuma ntibasabe imbabazi, abo bantu bazoronka ibihano vyo mu muriro udahera witiriwe Jahannamu, kandi bazoronka ibihano biba turira neza cane
Mu vy’ukuri bamwe bemera Imana yabo y’ukuri, nukugira ibikorwa vyiza ntankeka bazoronka imirima irimwo inzuzi zica imbere yabo, iyi niyo ntsinzi niniya
Mu vy’ukuri uguhana kw’Umuremyi wawe kurakaze cane
Niyo yatanguje kurema ibiremwa vyose naniyo izobagarura
Nayo niyo ifise ikigongwe cinshi, n’ugukunda ibiremwa vyayo vyose
Nyene inyegamo y’iteka ntagatifu
Umugizi w’ukugira ico yishakiye cose
Mbega warashikiwe n’inkuru z’ingabo z’abatemera Imana yabo y’ukuri
Ariwe Fir’auni hamwe na Thamudu
Mugabo abahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri bagumye badadaza gusa
N’Imana iraba kikuje kumpande zose
Ahubwo iyi ni Qur’ani ntagatifu
Kuri urwo rubaho rushinguwe neza
